description: Finds the deployment and service YAML for a GKE service.
Tails the logs for a specific GCP project and log name.
syntax: command: gcloud-logs {log_name}\n  exec: gcloud logging tail projects/your-gcp-project/logs/{log_name}

description: Prints the current gcloud authenticated user.
syntax: command: gcloud-auth\n  exec: gcloud auth list --filter=status:ACTIVE --format='value(account)'
